library.name: Core
library.description: Contains various common-use functions. Unlike other libraries, this library is implicitly imported and can be used without calling import Core;.

function.name: assert
function.arg: Value to check. Error is generated if false.
message to display in the error if the condition is false. If none is provided, a generic message is displayed instead.
function.description: Causes a crash if the given condition is not true.

function.name: chr
function.description: Converts an integer representing an ASCII character into a 1-character string.

function.name: current_time
function.description: Returns the current Unix Timestamp (number of seconds from January 1st, 1970) as a float.

function.name: ord
function.description: Converts a one-character string into the integer ASCII code value for that character.

function.name: parseFloat
function.arg: String to convert to a float.
function.description: Converts a string that represents a floating point value into its actual numerical value. Returns null upon failure.

function.name: parseInt
function.arg: String to convert to an integer.
function.description: Converts a string that represents an integer value into its actual numerical value. Returns null upon failure.

function.name: print
function.description:
Outputs a value to standard output.
For platforms that do not support standard output, the closest equivalent is used. Notably for JavaScript, this is the developer's console.

function.name: typeof
function.arg: Value to determine the type of.
function.description: Determines the type of the given value and returns a value in the enum Core.Type.

enum.name: Type
enum.description: List of all possible types for a value. Returned by the typeof function.
